text: ididymitis - Growth hormone deficiency - Hearing impairment - Meningitis - Panhypogammaglobulinemia - Pneumonia - Prostatitis - Pyoderma - Recurrent bacterial infections - Recurrent enteroviral infections - Recurrent urinary tract infections - Septic arthritis - Short stature - Sinusitis - X-linked recessive inheritance - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
